data_source.reference: D.S.Leonard et al., Nucl. Instr. and Meth. A 591 (2008) (10.1016/j.nima.2008.03.001)

sample.description: APD with Au contact, made using MRC Al.
sample.name: APD, gold contact, made using MRC aluminum

measurement.description: For each of K, Th, and U, natural terrestrial abundance ratios were used to covert from isotopic to total elemental abundances. APD alpha counting was performed using the APD as both the sample and the detector, and is only sensitive to alphas from the active volume of the APD.
